paper_abstract: Change monitoring in skin lesion analysis has proven to be a useful adjunct in their assessment. This article presents a comparative study of the available change detection techniques applied to change visualization and quantification in bi-temporal psoriasis images. The chosen methods are evaluated on a time series of psoriasis images and results are compared with dermatologists' scores. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Automatic change detection and quantification of dermatological diseases with an application to psoriasis images
